Boland./NNP He/PRP was/VBD an/DT intelligent/JJ and/CC prosperous/JJ man,/NN and/CC the/DT owner/NN of/IN many/JJ hundred/CD acres/NNS of/IN the/DT best/JJS land/NN in/IN that/DT fine/JJ county./NN not/RB only/RB of/IN Munster,/NNP but/CC of/IN all/DT Ireland--vide/NNP Carleton's/NNP "Poor/NNP Scholar."/NNP The/DT sudden/JJ departure/NN of/IN the/DT Bolands/NNS from/IN the/DT intercourse/NN intended./. When/WRB you/PRP think/VBP of/IN me,/NNS let/VB it/PRP be/VB kindly,/JJ for/IN from/IN this/DT night/NN out/IN you/PRP will/MD never/RB see/VB the/DT Cannie/NNP Soogah/NNP more."/.
